Centrally located just outside downtown Cincinnati. Close to all major interstates and near all locations in the tri-state. Located right off the exit, it is easy to stop and drop then be right back on your way.

Metro Recycling will handle all of your commercial recycling needs. We pick up volume materials and provide any equipment you will need in the process. We handle all types of material, even hard to recycle items. We recycle paper, plastic and document destruction.
